    ⇒ demora, pausa, adiamento

    00907930-v (complain whiningly)
    ⇒ birra
    07211752-n (a complaint uttered in a plaintive whining way)
    ⇒ lamúria, zunido
  5412. whine ⇒ {event} ⇒ whine | zunir ⇒ zunido
    01042531-v (talk in a tearful manner)
    07211752-n (a complaint uttered in a plaintive whining way)
    ⇒ lamúria, zunido
  5413. bray ⇒ {event} ⇒ bray | zurrar ⇒ zurro
    01054553-v (braying characteristic of donkeys)
    07378059-n (the cry of an ass)
    ⇒ zurro
